definition: Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/also called 水瓶座
jewel/gem/treasure/precious
bottle/vase/pitcher/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for wine and liquids
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Aquarius People are likely to socialise with family friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 寶瓶座傾向於跟家友和親戚交往。

sentences.english: Pisces lies between Aries and Aquarius in the northern skies.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚位於北方天空中白羊座和寶瓶座之間。

sentences.english: Aquarians are very friendly people, great conversationalists and thinkers.
sentences.chinese: 寶瓶座的人非常友好，是個口才絕佳的思想家。

sentences.english: A constellation in the equatorial region of the Southern Hemisphere near Aquarius and Eridanus.
sentences.chinese: 鯨魚座南半球赤道地區靠近寶瓶座與波江座的星座。

sentences.english: Compared with famous has the aquarius ear annular nebula and the lyra ring nebula.
sentences.chinese: 比較著名的有寶瓶座耳輪狀星雲和天琴座環狀星雲。

sentences.english: Coming, or the birth of the Aquarian Age.
sentences.chinese: 你能到精神上的知覺，寶瓶座的時代來臨。

definition: Trouble issues from the mouth (idiom). A loose tongue may cause a lot of trouble.
to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to praise the virtue of sb or sth while concealing their faults
to play dumb/to slack off (idiom)
bustling/energetic
listener
to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
as to/considering/for
sly/treacherous
the two cannot exist together (idiom); irreconcilable differences/incompatible standpoints
the return of a prodigal son (idiom)
fatalism/fatalistic
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)/to suffer a double loss after trying to trick the enemy
pinyin: pei2 le5 fu1 ren2 you4 zhe2 bing1

definition: negative (response, emotion etc)
astrology
